interpretation: The Flag of Kiribati represents the country's oceanic culture and traditional values. The flag features a golden frigatebird flying over a rising sun, symbolizing the nation's aspirations for a brighter future. The blue and white waves represent the Pacific Ocean, which is central to the country's way of life. This card suggests that it is time to focus on your community and traditional values. It is a reminder to honor your cultural heritage and to connect with those around you. You may find that by doing so, you will feel a greater sense of purpose and belonging. This card can also indicate that you need to be more aware of the impact that your actions have on the environment. Take steps to reduce your carbon footprint and to protect our oceans and natural resources.
